name: tho_maz
description: Our princess has been kidnapped by a demonic wizard. Mike is not the first one who tries to save her; but he will be the last! Play against the enemies which getting harder each level, and defeat the wizard to get the princess.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows速 7 (64-bit) Processor: 2.0 GHz - Dual core Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows速 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2.5 GHz - Triple core Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 MB available space
